In the given paragraph, only "diethylstilbesterol" is the chemical entity mentioned. The term "estrogen" is actually a class of chemicals, but in this context, it is mentioned as a specific type of chemical that binds to the estrogen receptor, so it can be considered a chemical entity. However, since the paragraph specifically mentions "estrogen binding sites," it is clear that the focus is on diethylstilbesterol as the estrogenic agent in this study.
